item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

For Monday 10/31/2011 We have Another Brand New Location! :

O'Tooles Irish Pub & Restaurant

O'Tooles just opened up in a Newly Renovated location on Orange Street, Directly next to Pitkin Plaza.  (Across from the Federal Building)  It offers a spacious double sided Bar area with beautiful Irish Wood work and plenty of Restaurant Booths.  They offer a full bar including a wide Beer selection ranging from a few Craft Brews on tap, to Irish favorites both popular and little known (Tried Kilkenny before?), to bottles of your more typical American main stays.  The menu is a mix of Pub food and some great Irish dishes.

This is our First Visit to this Brand New Location, so lets give them the Old Collective Welcome!

The Owner (Colin) has offered us the following Specials:

$3 Domestics (Expect PBR/BudLight)

$4 House Wine

$4 Well Drinks

AND There will be a couple of trays of FREE FOOD Put out for us.

Please RSVP for this event so I can get us a Good Deal. For Happy Hour type events, if you are only a "Maybe" please put this in your RSVP Comment.

I know it's Halloween, but Stop in for a Pint before hand!  (Alcohol and Candy... mmmmm...)

I (A.J.) will serve as the contact for this evening. You can try my Cell at 315-345-9348, texting is fine as well.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: You can try to Call/Text AJ at 315-345-9348. We're also probably amongst the largest groups at the Bar for a Monday.
item.name: Happy Hour - O'Toole's Irish Pub! (NEW LOCATION!)
